content.detailedDescription: Today is easter 2014 me, my wife and two of our kids age 12 and 13 were in our backyard. i was smoking talking to my wife on one side and my kids were about 40 feet away talking. my son says "dad look at the red lights", so i walked over and observed a pair of red lights flying together maybe 1/8 mile apart but in formation. there was another identical reddish light lower and maybe a mile behind. the front pair crossed the sky at the speed of a fast plane before one just disappeared. then the one following was gone and finally 15 seconds later the last one disappeared. there was no sound.       we thought they might be airplanes because we live near a small airport but we have seen all lights and know the sounds all the different planes, jets, and helicopters make around here. while talking about what we had saw another two just appeared from nowhere and seemed to be coming in our direction. i saw another one a second later way behind and to the left. the main one in the center got bigger as if it was getting closer still with no sound. i thought to myself we're gonna see it up close and it'll be an airplane, but soon after that it disappeared . we were all like "what the hell did we just see?" we talked about it for a while ,maybe five minutes later i was pointing and talking to my son when we both saw a bright white blink of light in the same direction of the first pair we had seen. just a quick blink but very bright kind of like a led light. we were like what the f...?!!! so a total of 6 reddish orange objects.. my wife says more orange... and one weird flash of light where there were no stars or planes.
content.summary: Bright reddish lights, two together one a distance behind silently moving across the sky before disappearing one by one

content.detailedDescription: I was running with my iphone and headphones on listening to music in my yard at night it was behind me then i seen it and it seemed to stop over head and i went in the house to tell my mother and stepfather to come and look at it. my mother went outside first to look on the porch did not see anything she went to our driveway and seen a huge object and when she seen it, it seemed to stop and spin and hover there and then it made a whizzing type sound she called me and my stepdad over and said she seen it we came over and seen it again i tried to get it on recording but then it went across quickly after that
content.summary: It was a huge object while i was running in my yard it looked as it was following me then it hovered over head i went inside to tell my mom and stepdad about it

content.detailedDescription: My son called me in the house and said he seen a ufo outside in the yard that seemed to be following him. i went out there and looked went to our drive way and i  called my son and husband over to me and i seen something coming across slowly in the sky it was huge white and glowed very brightly and had blue lights on top and red on the bottom of it then it stayed in one place and spun around making a loud whizzing sound and then it went across the sky and was gone.
content.summary: It looked like an oval shape very huge and glowing white very bright with red lights on the bottom of it and on top blue lights make a whizzing sound as it hovered and spun around for a few seconds and then it went across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving eastbound on c470 when i noticed a large amber light aprox 45 degrees above the horizon. it did not appear to be moving. i kept it in my sight as i drove east i drove directly under it as it hovered above the highway. it was circular with five amber coloredmaking round glowing lights underneath. it did not appear to be making any sound. i could not tell how big it was because i could not judge how high up it was against the dark sky. as i drove under it i could see the clearly defined outer edge of the object and clearly defined edges of the lights. after i drove past i looked to find it in my rearview mirror, but i could not see it.
content.summary: Round object with five circular amber glowing lights on bottom hovering over c470 highway near yosemite

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i was leaving tye texas heading west to trent texas driving on the frontage road i looked up and seen clouds shaped like a poodle so we decided to take a picture to show my kids when we got home. i didnt realise my volume was down when i was taking the pictures so i took 3 to be exact and showed my mother the strange light i had caught i was andstill am pretty freaked out about it and my mom said i just took a picture of an ufo can you please tell me what i had captured asap! the object disapeared as fast as it came
content.summary: Under photo of boomerrang looks like a parachute when enlarged

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my front porch talking on my cell phone.  i looked to the west and saw bright lights, and at first, i thought i saw fireworks because the lights were so bright.  i realized it was raining, so it couldn't be fireworks. the lights were below the clouds. i realized the lights ( which appeared to be red, white, and green side by side) were moving toward me to the east very quickly.  i yelled for my husband to come outside.  he witnessed this also. the moving lights came to a dead stop. it hovered for a few moments, flared bright white/blue colors and started descending. it descended below the tree line rather quickly. there was no sound at all. when i called for my husband, i was very excited and felt when the object stopped, it was almost like it saw us. we tried to get a picture with an i-pad, but was unsuccessful.
content.summary: Fast moving very bright lights that stopped and descended below tree ilne.

content.detailedDescription:
We stopped the car after climbing mauna kea before reaching the observatories because the moon was so clear...My wife took a picture of the moon and when she looked at the digital image in the display she got a little excited and said hey look at this...I didn't think much of it because it was just like a blue speck in the frame below the moon, barely visible...But she showed it to the couple with us and they got kind of excited so we turned the car lights off but still couldn't see anything...(the object was not visible to the naked eyes)she took 2 more pictures at different angles and the image was still there...Then she tried taking more but the camera would not take another picture no matter how she adjusted the settings on her canon rebel 3 camera...Later when we got home and put it up on our 32" sony monitor there was a lot of detail and each picture was shaped slightly different... we were dumbfounded and thought we had captured some kind of energy vortex...My friend suggested it was a cloaked mothership and the cone shape below was some kind of propulsion system at work...I later posted it on fb and a lot of people were surprised and told me i should contact coast to coast but i wanted the pics analyzed by a credible source to rule out some kind of lense reflection cause....So a friend recommended reporting to you and i remembered reading about how serious your staff document these type of things so i decided to contact you...We still have the images on the media card in the camera but don't know what to do next...You can see the 3 images/pics on fb on my timeline under robert bounds, hilo, hi send me a friend invite and i'll respond

thanks
robert bounds
content.summary: Wife was taking pictures of a bright moon above the cloudline/object not visible to naked eye object noticed after snapping photo

content.detailedDescription:
the stationary object or event that i observed seemed to consist of four extraordinarily bright, white lights that seemed to fit together as part of a larger whole. these component lights, in perfect geometric array, looked like four tic-tac candy pellets lined up side by side, thus making for an overall flat, rectangular unit like a window shade with a few flat slats or louvres, though i did not see a structural border to that implied gestalt. unlike candy pellets, these four components did not project tubular volume; they appeared as very flat sources of bright light. the shorter sides of the rectangular array oriented east to west.

this object or event was visible as an intensely bright flash; it was a clean, pulse-like emission of light that did not scatter, as does starlight when traversing our planet���s atmosphere. the pulse lasted for approximately one second. the four lights flashed simultaneously only once, followed by a sharp, brief, pulse of neon blue---the sort seen on bioluminescent plankton--that "outlined" or bordered the array. yet the very geometric components and behavior of this object or event seemed to be mechanical or engineered, not a biological life form, at least not as we know we know it.

as for relative size, i was able to fully cover the relevant patch of sky with the upper quarter of my thumb, with my arm outstretched. 

it seemed to me that this object or event belonged to the deep night sky, as opposed to our atmosphere, as do aircraft and even spaceships shortly after launch. subjectively, it felt that i had unwittingly observed a signal not meant for me to see or utilize, as opposed to the signal from a lighthouse, for example, which any observer clearly feels was put into place for the sake of all observers within its reach, or the lights of flying aircraft, also meant to announce their presence and flight paths.

i had been engaged in naked-eye, casual observation of constellations and meteors when this sighting took place over a remote bay called bahia salinas, in cabo rojo, puerto rico. it was approximately 10:45 pm and i had been observing the zenith of a very clear night sky, when the object or event flashed right before my eyes.  i am a professionally-trained observer with studies and teaching credentials in visual perception. quick pencil sketch made under dim hotel lamp attached.
content.summary: bright pulse from lights in tight geometric array high above in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: With 3 kids i smoke outside on my front porch. almost every night i can sit on porch and watch jets fly over. once before around new years something flew over that i cant explain, and then it happened again on the above mentioned date. at around 9:35 something flew over that i thought might have been a us bomber jet, with different sides of the craft ligthing up and blinking at different times( not a steady blink as seen on other planes), it was followed by what i assume is a military f-16(normal blinking lights). roughly 2-4 minutes later i see what looks like a round or disc shaped object, not blinking just glowing white(just like a star) moving across the sky, well as i look away in other direction i notice 2 planes with blinking lights (assumed military) coming at it from different directin (straight on). the solid lit/star like craft continued going straight then started to do what i would call circles in the air, as if it was waiting for the 2 approaching jets to get closer to it, then it veered left and shot off. leaving no trail or nothing, gone in a blink in an eye, it left faster than a shooting star flashes through the sky. this unknown flying object was completely silent. my 8 month old daughter was asleep when i purposely yelled in my house for my wife to come see it. neither one of us can explain what we saw. i stepped back inside at exactly 9:39. my start time on this event may be off by a few minutes but the end time is exact, as i checked my phone when walking in the door. usually every night around 9:30 i can step outside and watch the lights of the planes flying up above, we can even see the military jets flying over during day light hours as well, i am completely in shock at what i saw, to me it is simply an ufo as i can not explain the solid lit craft that i observed, and i am not so sure the first craft i saw was something that belongs to our government either.
content.summary: Cant in 25 words

content.detailedDescription:
To start as i stated in an earlier report, this has been happening everynight.I now go out everynight just to see them. tonight 4/20/14 i saw 6. all were traveling se. tonight however i had a digital camera, but the problem is that it is very poor quality i will be upgrading and i dont have the cable to upload the photos and videos i have taken.But i do have several wich i will be uploading at a later date.These objects are almost the same every night. i usually see about 3 stragglers, then i see a pack of 3. there is also one i saw tonight that was stationary with flashing blue green lights to the far east of were i was. please someone with good camera equipment come out to hudson, i guarentee that these objects will be seen i have seen them every night mostly traveling in the same direction. if whom ever reads this report knows or suspects what i might be seeing please email me what you think as i am going nuts wondering. i would like to believe that they are et craft, but i cannot be sure, i feel that with the correct equipment some one can positively id these white lights.     at first i thought that i saw a shooting star,and now have concluded that the fact that they appear everynight they must not be. i use ursa major as a point of referance i highly reccomend if someone is to investigate they do the same. my confidance is 100 percent that these lights will be seen asgain i also used the radar app on the mufon web site there were no  airplanes at the time.       please help me id these i really hope mufon can find out what they are!!!!!!!!!!!!!!   
    thank you.
content.summary: 3 in a row seconds apart traveling identically

content.detailedDescription:
At 9 pm myself and my wife were on our deck when we both noticed a bright red-orange light pulsating and moving fast across the sky. first thought was aircraft but i quickly realized it was not the standard aircraft "strobe" lights. the lights were pulsating 1.5 seconds on, 1 second off.

my wife noticed as well that there was an actual aircraft within the same view and the comparison of the lights and speed were not even close. the object was moving 100 times faster than the aircraft. from the time we noticed it from the southwest horizon / treeline to going out of view to the northeast it took approximately 5 minutes. i would estimate that at over 400 miles covered in that small amount of time. myself and wife are both ex military and have been overseas and deployed, we know what aircraft strobes look like, this was a smooth pulsating light, not the sharp intense quick strobe. also with aircraft you can normally tell the front from rear strobes alternating. this was on solid pulse.

it appeared to be about the same flight level as a commercial aircraft but much larger in size compared to the aircraft that was in view.

last thing is the path it took, sw to n, is not a flight path for any commercial aircraft. there is a commercial route that almost all the airlines take moving through the northeast which is se to nw. i have lived here for 15 years and never seen an aircraft take that path. if it continued on that path it would of been se of greenland very quickly and then over open water.
content.summary: Large pulsating fast moving light

content.detailedDescription: I was with 2 other people travelling on the highway from bedford to halifax, when another occupant of the car pointed it out.  i asked my girlfriend who was driving to pull over so we could have a look at it, i got out of the car and watched it for another 30 seconds to 1 minute.  i tried snapping a photo of it but my smartphone went completely dead and wouldn't turn back on until after it was gone.  the object looked very large and similar to a metallic airliner fuselage but 2-3x larger, no wings, nose, or tail.  it was clearly a solid structure and while it was hovering it looked like it was moving ever so slightly, it was parallel and just to the west of the high way.  there were no lights and it emitted no sound but after about 90 seconds of watching this cigar-shaped craft it disappeared, like it had turned invisible in under 1 second.
content.summary: A silver metallic wingless cylinder

content.detailedDescription: Going to taco bell around 10:20 pm. stepped in the car to see a glowing reddish sphere above the rooftops. it descended then stayed in one spot hovering when i took the picture. then it moved beyond the houses and was gone.
content.summary: Bright glowing hovering sphere

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the patio directly outside of my house on my 18 acre farm in west central minnesota reading book at the picnic table.  i heard a sound like air being displaced.  the best way i can describe it is if you were to attach a ball to a rope and swing it, or maybe the sound you hear when your on a swingset, but milder than that.  i was sitting facing south and i could hear it behind me and over my right shoulder (from the west / north west direction).  i looked up and the aircraft was basically directly over head with a bearing of east / south east.  i had my eyes on it for probably 20 seconds before it was over the horizon of the hill to the east side of my property.  

it's ~70 degrees fahrenheit outside and there is not a cloud in the sky, so i had an unobstructed view of it as it passed over.  it appeared mostly dark brown in color, although there was some variation, and i remember thinking at the first second i saw it, wow that's a big hawk.  but i immediately realized it was not as it was very obviously geometrically shaped, traveling at a high rate of speed with a perfectly straight trajectory and with no apparent movement in the craft.  i confess to feeling bewildered as i sat watching it which apparently kept me from picking up the camera i had placed in front of me for photographing ducks in the pond, but i'm not sure i would have had time to pick it up and focus it even if i had the sense to do so at the time.

the main thin about it that threw me off was the bizarre sound, or lack of sound.  it literally made a constant whooshing noise, which did not change in frequency as you would expect from something like the doppler effect you hear from a car passing by, but was a constant volume and tone from the moment i heard it until it was over the horizon at which point the sound completely subsided.  it as faint.  if i had been listening to music at low volume i would have never looked up.  it was roughly as loud as the surrounding birds, but obvious enough to take notice.  

there was absolutely no noise that you would normally associate with an aircraft.  no turbine noise, no propeller noise, nothing like that at all.  there was only the faint whoosh as it traveled.

i can recall a few seconds into watching it, really when it flew over my grain silos (which are 70' tall) that i attempted to take survey of its altitude.  i was and continue to have a really difficult time making sense of it's apparent altitude.  i was bewildered at this while i walked from outside to the computer, and now that i've had a moment to reflect i think the reason i was having a hard time establishing perspective is due to the complete lack of noise or contrail, one of which has always accompanied aircraft i've viewed in the sky.  i used to live near a marine base in nc where f-16's and other military craft flew by and the sound was always a good indicator for me of how high they were.  the other thing i had a hard time reasoning through was how fast it was moving.  i was thinking as it passed that it would have had to have been at low altitude to appear to be moving as fast as it was, and for a brief moment i questioned whether it was a remote controlled jet of some kind, but there are definitely no rc planes that look like that, that make no noise and are even close to that fast.  plus i live miles from my closes neighbor and they certainly aren't interested in rc planes.  what i can say is that it had to be at least 4 times higher than my 70' silo, but beyond that i really can't say for sure.  if it was at an altitude of say, 280', which now that i say it sounds very unlikely, i would guess it was traveling at least several hundred miles per hour.  if it was at a higher altitude than that, and traversed the distance it appeared to, then it was really moving fast.

in terms of size, again, i'd be guessing due to my uncertainty on it's altitude, but the description i selected above is probably the case, that it would have been obstructed by a golf ball at arms length.  if i was begged down to a guess i'd say maybe 30' - 50' in width and roughly that in length.

i'm at a loss attempting to describe why i can't provide a better explanation of either the features of the aircraft or it's altitude.  the best way i can describe it is that as i was looking up at this thing, i just felt confused.  it's not often that you look at something and flat out can't place it.  in the brief time it was in front of me, my mind was focused on shuffling through first the possibilities as to what it was, and before coming to real resolution on that, it left my line of site while it passed over the silo at which point i started thinking about what altitude it must have been at and then my mind went back to the sound and i tried to focus on the aircraft for any sign of propulsion, and then it was gone.  

here's what i know for sure.  i'm an engineer with a solid understanding of how the world around me works, i'm also interested in pretty much anything with an engine, including aircraft.  i've been to the usaf museum at wright patterson as well as other aircraft museums including both nasa installations.  i've seen a b2 up close and it wasn't that.  could it have been an f-117?  maybe???  does an f-117 make zero noise whatsoever?  i haven't seen one in flight, but i doubt it very much.  are they now painted brown?  i don't think so.  aside from that comparison, which i feel would be a bit of a stretch, i've never seen and definitely never heard anything like it before.  i sure would love to know what it was though.
content.summary: Silent, predominately brown / gold in color, triangular shaped, no contrail, high rate of speed, directly over my property

content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking at the sky watching an aircraft making chem trails.  there was a huge cross of chem trails,  along with other chem trails.  the aircraft was making a second pass over one chem trail that was part of the cross. i had already taken one photo with my cell phone but because it was so bright outside,  i wasn't sure what i was taking a picture of. i took some more pictures to make sure i was getting pictures of the aircraft and chem trails.  when i went inside to look at my photos,  that is when i saw what i consider a ufo.  i can't tell what the object is. it is located in the upper left corner of the photo. i noticed it when i sent the photo to my computer to get a better look at pics i took. i am sending 5 pics because i can't remember which one it is on and i can only see it when i enlarge the pic.
content.summary: Saw an object when i reviewed pics i had taken of a plane making chem trails.

content.detailedDescription:
I witnessed an apparent disc shaped object with around four or five yellowy golden light cylindrical lights on the bottom of the object with gaps in between them, almost as if you had five rectangles, and had curved them slightly to the edges of the disc on the bottom. i could not tell an exact distance but it was probably under a mile away, and then over a period of around five minutes got smaller and smaller as it moved off into the distance. i had a friend with me at the time who could not identify the nature of the craft also, and it was a very clear night when witnessed. it is the only disc shaped flying object i have ever personally witnessed, but one i will never forget. 
i was at my friends house who lived around 5 house higher than me on my street at the time. the disc as it moved off eventually reached the horizon/hills in the distance and we eventually lost sight. i was a believer before the event that we are not alone in the universe, but i do not claim to have seen a spaceship piloted by aliens, purely a flying object that i could not identify with and something i can still not explain today.
content.summary: Disc that slowly travelled into distance

content.detailedDescription: Went to post office in town new baltimore mi when i got out of the car i looked up saw a cross with a arrow in the north started recording. no sound came from it see video
content.summary: Went to post office in town new baltimore mi when i got out of the car i looked up saw a cross with a arrow in the north started recording

content.detailedDescription: I have been seeing theses lights everynight for about a week everynight all but one have been from about 7-12pm. i am confidant, that if you are in the hudson nh area at apprx  9pm ish   you will  see for yourself. they are traveling in all different directions and i use ursa major as a point of referance.Just look for awhile i have seen more than 4 everynight for a week it is 4/20/14 .
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten off work at 4pm . it took me 10 minutes to get home . i was getting out of my car when i looked up and notice how pretty the clouds looked with the sun shinning up thru the clouds , so i pulled out my ipod touch and took a few pics . later when i was showing the pics to my wife , she pointed out a glowing object . i then took a look at the pics and in three of them there appears to be an object and in the forth pic you can see the object fading away . i did send the pics to a local news station and they did post them but didn't say anything about the object over ft hood . i talked stanton friedman about these pics and he suggested i send them to you .
content.summary: I was looking at a cloud formation and didn't. see the object till later

content.detailedDescription: I was working on andrews afb in md. a coworker and i were on the flight line waiting to recover one of our aircraft it was around 11 pm we were sitting in a tow tractor when a disc like object flew right by us so we both got out and were looking for it and it came back and hovered over us it did not have any nav lights but i gave off a blast of air when it was by us. then we both see it land on the other side of the runway and then saw it pull into a hanger with no lights on then the doors on the hanger close very fast. a couple minutes later our aircraft lands and we ask our aircrew if the saw anything and they told us that they did not but were in a holding pattern. they asked us if any other aircraft had landed because the could not see anything coming in. we told them that there was no aircraft that landed. the next day my coworker and i decided to drive over to the side of the base were the disc landed but we were told we did not have access to that part of the base but it "was open to the hole base to drive up to the hanger"  because i have driven to that hanger quite a few times with out any problems before the night before. we both were very confused on what was going on because all flight for the next month got canceled if it was going to have a return after 1030 pm. we both got taken off the night shift for that month also.
content.summary: Black object passing over my head and landing

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on hwy 385 from odessa tx toward crane tx. when i noticed a funny looking cloud or vapor trail so i took a picture with my phone. months later (for whatever reason) i was looking at pictures on my phone, saw that picture and decided to zoom in on it. well, at the very top of the photo, above the vapor trail were two shiney, metallic objects with what appears to be one black dot on each craft. i'm not sure what this is. i did not see the crafts at the time i took the photo, so i didn't feel anything one way or the other.
content.summary: Saw a funny cloud-like thing in the sky and took a picture of it.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?  i was letting our dog outside and saw a line of lights inbetween the trees to the northeast.
i have a kent, wa address but live near the city of covington, wa border.

2. what made you first notice the object?
it was soo straight in a very long/wide way and flashing and seemed to be colorful in a pretty way.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? i thought it was a plane but it was not moving at first that i could tell soo i called to my mother and asked her opionin.  we both watched it and it then seemed to be moving the wrong direction. if it were a plane with lights, it should be moving towards us, not away.  it stayed low and very slowly moved out of site behind the trees to the northeast over covington, wa.  if i had to guess... i would say it was close to a mile away.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
  lots of lights in a very straight line, must have been huge object, random flashing lights was more than what planes have that fly over our house and planes are much higher over the tree lines.  could not see a shape, it was dark at about 10:15 pm  we watched it for about 10 minutes before we could no longer see it.  oddly, it did not seem to get smaller as it moved away, it must have been large, perhaps it only moved slowly behind the trees, by moving slightly to the right.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
feelings: excited that it was not a plane and glad it was not over my home! 
reactions: staring confused/wondering why the plane has so many lights and not moving towards us as a plane would. then, excited yelling for my mom to come and dad to get the binoculars to see the odd object to confirm whether i was correct in thinking the plane should be getting closer/moving. mom said "quiet" "i don't hear a sound, do you?" no sound was heard. dad was too slow and so mom and i just watched it stay there, then, slowly move behind trees. dad didn't seem to care and continued to watch tv. it did not appear to change size, it did not get bigger or smaller as it moved.  so, i suppose it could be moving away from us and was just huge or only just hid behind the trees, by moving slightly to our right.
immediately after:  mom went to bed, dad watched tv and i kept looking outside to see if were there but nope.  i decided to submit my sighting about 30min later. watched some tv on my computer and went to bed not too soon after that.  however, i asked my parents and they cant remember if i stayed up to watch tv or not. haha
content.summary: Saw a line of lights with some flashing towards the covington, wa area.  it seemed to hover. then moved towards and possibly past covington, wa

content.detailedDescription: For the second time i have seen a red colored hovering light around my area that moves at a pace that goes slow and then quickly moves about. it does not have flashing lights. it is not stationary.
content.summary: It was not a plantet. it was not a plane (no flashing lights).

content.detailedDescription: On saturday night myself and several friends witnessed an orb, it moved quickly in a western direction, it seemed to pulsate and then it disappeared into thin air right in front of us.
content.summary: Saw glowing orb headed east from ocean, orb pulsates and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: A glowing orange orb that was extremely bright. it came over the horizon after my friend saw it earlier while walking her dog. she saw it as much larger and came to the house to alert us that we had to come see something outside. then we saw it come out. it came into view and hovered above us. it seemed to pulsate then either get small and dissappear or fly off into space. i personally feel it just flew off into the distance which gave it the appearance of getting small and out of sight.
content.summary: A glowing orange orb that was extremely bright. it came over the horizon after my friend saw it earlier while walking her dog. she saw it as much larger and came to the house to alert us that we had to come see something outside. then we saw it come out.

content.detailedDescription: 5 red glowing lights just slowlly movin up then dissapeard
content.summary: 5 red glowing lights just slowlly movin up then dissapeard

content.detailedDescription: While walking my dog, i saw a bunch of kids looking up in sky, when i looked up i saw what i described above. a huge red/orange pulsating orb.At first i thought it was a star exploding. i ran home since i had company that did not believe in ufo's, we walked outside and all five of us witness this take off at light speed. neighbor also witness. 5 witness all together .
content.summary: Five of us witnessed huge red/orange orb hover above then take off at light speed or it just disappeared . no sound, plane and helicopters were within one mile of orb.

content.detailedDescription:
I go to brackett field almost everyday to sit in my car and eat lunch. i'm retired and enjoy watching the planes. i glanced up at the sky through my sunroof and for a split second saw what looked like to me a small box shaped object, 20-30 feet long , 6-10 feet high,(actually looked like the shuttle on the program 'star trek) flash across the sky at a very low altitude (200-300 feet). the vehicle was dark gray, had no wings or windows, did not have any visible exhaust or make a sound.

i only saw this thing for a nano second as it was going extremely fast! i looked over to my left, towards the san gabriel mountains,to get a better view of this object and it was already gone from sight!

this object was flying extremely low to the ground, over a small plane airport. it came from the direction of the pacific ocean and was flying towards the north which would have taken it over the mountains and then the mojave desert. it was flying so fast, it was already gone when i looked to my left to get a better view as it flew by. it was flying faster then any airplane! and, i heard no noise or sound barrier 'crack' as it went by.It was a sheer fluke that i saw it all! it was quite amazing believe me!

by the way, i was in the air force for six years and am a retired deputy sheriff.
content.summary: I was sitting in my veh. looking at sky through sun roof. saw object flying low and fast going from south to north.

content.detailedDescription: Beautiful elliptical of colors pulsed. stay in position in sky for over an hour. then craft slowly traveled sw into foggy sky it almost seemed that a few times after that a red lighting bolt appeared and then a white bolt of light appeared shortly while craft left right around the position that it was hovering
content.summary: Pulsates diamond shape, no sound, hovered close to an hour or more

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i took the dogs out around 10:45 i looked up and notice a bright star then i noticed it moved i told my wife and she started to watch it and we both notice it move left then right back to it's original  spot.  we moved around the back yard to make sure it wasn't clouds or tree limbs making it appear that it was moving. my wife took the dogs in and i called my daughter and she went out in her yard (about 15 miles away) and she was seeing the same thing at the same time i was.  my wife came out and she took pictures and some video with her camera. this went on for about half an hour to about 45 min. we all just came in. not sure if this is just a star but i would get bright then dim move left then back looked like it turned and some times it would change shape.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Clear night looked up and notice a very bright star then notice it moving.
